basics.summary: Full-stack engineer with production experience across the UI, API and infrastructure layers. Proven track record of shipping impactful features - from AI-powered workflows to third-party integrations and billing systems.

work.name: Cambridge Kinetics
work.summary: Worked across frontend, backend and infrastructure (Vue 3, C#/ASP.NET Core, GraphQL, MongoDB) to build and maintain a production-grade SaaS business management platform.
highlights: Designed and deployed LLM-powered workflow automation, reducing manual configuration time from hours to seconds.
Architected and implemented real-time data synchronization service integrating multiple external systems, processing thousands of daily updates across heterogeneous schemas and OAuth flows.
Scoped requirements with stakeholders and led end-to-end delivery of production features, including system design, testing strategy, CI/CD integration and Azure deployment.
Extended Stripe billing to support usage-based pricing and implemented integrations with Xero and QuickBooks, handling OAuth flows, webhooks and resilient error handling.
Redesigned REST endpoints to support high-volume bulk operations (10k+ records), improving throughput and reducing client round-trips.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and managed Azure production deployments.
Mentored graduate and junior engineers through code review, pair programming and onboarding.
